inputs.mainInformation: On this page, you can edit the data that was specified during registration. You can change the name of the organization, add or change media links, phone number of the organization, etc.

organizationName.label: Full name of the organization
organizationName.information: In Ukrainian (in accordance with the Charter)

certificateOfRegister.label: Certificate of entry into the register
certificateOfRegister.information: To download a document, click on the paperclip icon or the “Download document” field. Format jpg, jpeg, png or pdf. Maximum size 5 MB.

dateOfRegisterOrganization.label: Date of registration of the organization

positionOrganization.label: Position of the organization's representative
positionOrganization.forExample: For example: Manager, IA, Accountant, etc.

positionOfMember.label: Position
positionOfMember.information: Enter the role of the employee (accountant, driver, etc.) or leave the field blank

email.label: Representative's e-mail address (e-mail)
email.information: This email address will be your login. You will receive an email to the specified email address regarding the results of processing your registration request.

socialNetworks.label: Link to the social network
socialNetworks.information: Add links to social media - no more than 5. (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Youtube, etc.).

checkbox.information: I agree to the processing of personal data in accordance with the

avatar.information: Add an image or leave it blank and we will automatically add the first letters of your first and last name. Max size 5 MB. Format jpg, jpeg, png.

register.title: REGISTER?
register.text: and send an email with the password to

modalUserWithoutAccess.text: Sorry, You don't have access to this board.

successfulRegistration.title: Thank you for registering!
successfulRegistration.firstPartText: After verification of your data (within 48 business hours), you will receive an email to the specified email address
successfulRegistration.secondPartText: with a login and password. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us!

save.title: SAVE CHANGES?
save.text: This page contains data that was not saved.

enterPass.title: ENTER YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS
enterPass.text: A message with a link to change your password will be sent to this email address

radioBtn.notValidUSREOU: Incorrect or inaccurate data in the EDRPOU.
radioBtn.insufficientDocuments: Insufficient documents to confirm the status of a charitable organization..
radioBtn.noneCompliance: Failure to comply with the requirements or norms stipulated by law for charitable organizations.

validation.notEmpty: The field must be filled in
validation.taxNumber: Tax number must contain exactly 8 Arabic numerals.
validation.siteStart: The input field must begin with https://...
validation.passwordMismatch: The entered passwords do not match
validation.spacesNotAllowed: Leading and trailing spaces are not allowed

login.companyAlreadyRegistered: The company with {errors} is already registered

loader.bottom: This may take a few seconds.

board.limitExceeded: You can create no more than {int} boards on this page.
board.emptyBoard: There is no board with your participation on this page yet

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subTitle: Heading 1 for subparagraphs
privacyPage.introText: We greatly value your trust and are committed to ensuring the reliable protection of your confidential information. This Privacy Policy outlines in detail how we collect, use, transfer, and store your personal data while you use our ERP system. We strive to maintain transparency in all of our actions related to your data and guarantee that all processes adhere to the highest standards of security and privacy. Our system is designed with cutting-edge information security technologies to prevent unauthorized access to your data. We use a comprehensive approach to security, including both technical and organizational measures, to ensure the protection of your personal data at every stage of its processing. We understand how important it is for you to know what data is being collected, for what purposes it is used, and who has access to it. This document will explain in detail how we manage your information and what steps you can take to protect your data or correct any errors. We also provide you with the ability to control your data and privacy rights, ensuring maximum control on your part. Whether you are a new user or an experienced client, we are always committed to providing you with a safe and comfortable experience while using our system. Should you have any questions or need additional clarification, our support team is always available to assist you. We are happy to help you navigate all aspects of protecting your data.
privacyPage.list:
1. Collection of Information.
2. We may collect the following types of personal information.
3. We collect information from the following sources.
4. Data that you provide directly when registering or using the system.
5. Automatic data collection through the use of cookies and similar technologies.
6. Use of Information.
7. We use your data to.
8. Providing and maintaining the functionality of the ERP system.

We use a comprehensive approach to security, including both technical and organizational measures, to ensure that your personal data is protected at every stage of its processing. We understand how important it is for you to know what data is collected, for what purposes it is used and who has access to it. In this document, we will explain in detail how we manage your information and what steps you can take to protect your data or correct any errors. We also give you the ability to manage your data and privacy rights, which guarantees maximum control on your part. Whether you're a new user or an experienced customer, we're always committed to providing you with a safe and comfortable experience with our system. If you have any questions or need additional explanations, you can always contact our support team. We will be happy to help you understand all aspects of protecting your data.
